replies.body: Shouldn't be that hard to get an S later on, not many people can play Sol.

Sol is pretty much my main (next to Azir) and i find that he has a very high skill floor, but a very low skill ceiling.
Meaning he is hard to play well, but once you can play him well its fairly easy to make that next step and play him to to most/all of his potential.
_(Yasuo would be the inverse to this, anyone can play Yasuo well, but only the highly skilled can play him to his full potential)_

So you are right, getting an S is far from impossible on him. (especially during the free week where the averages probably drop)
